SUMMARY:
Require a tight timeline and deep dive transforming analytics and reports within the PowerBI space among utilizing other software.  They are interested in understanding the capabilities of Apexon, and if they can possibly use a resource for their need.  

Skill Require

â€¢	Snowflake

enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is crucial for driving data-driven decision-making within the organization. As a skilled data analyst, you will be responsible for transforming complex data into meaningful insights that inform strategic business decisions. You will leverage your expertise in SQL, Snowflake, and data modeling to design and develop impactful analytics and reporting solutions, primarily within the PowerBI ecosystem. Your ability to translate data into actionable intelligence will be instrumental in supporting various business intelligence initiatives and enabling the organization to make informed, data-driven choices.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain complex SQL queries and data models to extract, transform, and load data from multiple sources
- Utilize Snowflake's capabilities to optimize data storage, processing, and querying for enhanced performance and scalability
- Design and build interactive, visually-appealing dashboards and reports using PowerBI, ensuring data is presented in a clear and insightful manner
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into effective data solutions
- Continuously monitor and optimize data pipelines, identifying opportunities for improvement and automation
- Provide expert-level support and guidance to stakeholders, educating them on data interpretation and driving data-driven decision-making
- Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in data analytics, data modeling, and business intelligence

Required Skills:
- Proficient in SQL, with the ability to write complex queries and optimize performance
- Strong understanding of data modeling principles and techniques
- Expertise in Snowflake, including its features and functionalities for data storage, processing, and querying
- Proven experience in designing and developing interactive dashboards and reports using PowerBI
- Excellent problem-solving and critical thinking skills to tackle complex data challenges
- Strong communication and stakeholder management skills to effectively translate data insights into actionable recommendations

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with additional BI/analytics tools (e.g., Tableau, Qlik, Microsoft Excel)
- Knowledge of data visualization best practices and techniques
- Familiarity with agile project management methodologies
- Understanding of data governance and data quality principles

Required Experience:
- Minimum of 7 years of hands-on experience in SQL and data analysis
- At least 5 years of experience in data modeling and designing data solutions
- Proven track record of delivering successful BI and analytics projects

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in a fast-paced, data-driven environment
- Exposure to various industry domains and business use cases
- Familiarity with cloud-based data platforms and technologies

Tools & Technologies:
- SQL (e.g., T-SQL, PL/SQL)
- Snowflake
- PowerBI
- Data modeling tools (e.g., Erwin, Visio)
- Agile project management tools (e.g., Jira, Trello)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team
- Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and methodologies
- Strong attention to detail and commitment to data quality and integrity
- Ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines simultaneously
